content: Yes, it is truly heartbreaking to think about the impact that the conflict had on the Nez Perce tribe and their cultural traditions. The loss of their way of life and sacred lands is a devastating legacy of the war. However, it's important to note that despite the challenges they faced, the Nez Perce people have continued to persevere and maintain their cultural heritage. With a renewed focus on preservation and education, the tribe has been able to rediscover and keep their traditions alive, ensuring that their rich culture will continue to be celebrated for generations to come.
